activity_differential: group of people walking along roadside
description: A group of people are walking along a dirt path beside a road with passing vehicles, under a partly cloudy sky. The camera tracks the group as they approach and pass by.

relationship_filter_metadata.explanation: A minivan on the ground cannot be 'in front of' a cloud in a meaningful spatial sense, as clouds are in the sky above and behind physical ground-level objects.
relationship_filter_metadata.label: physically_impossible

relationship_filter_metadata.explanation: A minivan cannot be physically positioned 'under' a horizontal barrier as described; the spatial relationship is implausible given typical sizes and arrangement.
relationship_filter_metadata.label: physically_impossible

relationship_filter_metadata.explanation: The object lacks a name and description, so the spatial relationship 'in front of' cannot be validated or interpreted.
relationship_filter_metadata.label: insufficient_context

relationship_filter_metadata.label: physically_impossible
